metadata.title: CVE-2021-44273 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: e2guardian v5.4.x <= v5.4.3r is affected by missing SSL certificatevalidation in the SSL MITM engine. In standalone mode (i.e., acting as aproxy or a transparent proxy), with SSL MITM enabled, e2guardian, if builtwith OpenSSL v1.1.x, did not validate hostnames in certificates of the webservers that it connected to, and thus was itself vulnerable to MITMattacks.

criterions.comment: e2guardian: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
